name: Nycto (LiptonLeon)
description:
Explore a mysterious dimmension that you have been trapped in.  Solve puzzles to escape this abstract non-euclidean world. Although your friends died along the way, you are not alone out there...

Nycto is still in development, so we would be more than happy to hear your opinion!
Feedback form: https://forms.gle/YhW9yuia6bWT5cXS9

Game developed by Exotic Butters 🧈
